name: Spicy Prawn Soup
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add diced onion, minced garlic, grated ginger, and sliced chilies. Saut√© until fragrant.
Add paprika and cayenne pepper. Stir well to combine.
Add prawns to the pot and cook until they turn pink.
Pour in the chicken or vegetable broth and bring to a simmer.
Stir in the coconut milk and fish sauce. Let it simmer for another 5 minutes.
Squeeze in the lime juice and season with salt to taste.
Serve the spicy prawn soup hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.
